bibl.title: Letter from Boykin Wright and Boykin Wright, Jr., to Henry Rose Carter, October 25, 1915

div1.p: The Wrights are returning Carter's report on impounded waters.

div1.head: Letter from Boykin Wright and Boykin Wright, Jr., to Henry Rose Carter, October 25, 1915
div1.opener:
LAW OFFICES
WRIGHT & WRIGHT
420-427-428 DYER BUILDING
AUGUSTA, GEORGIA
BOYKIN WRIGHT
BOYKIN WRIGHT, JR.
A--955.
October 25th, 1915.
Dr, H. R. Carter,
Assistant Surgeon General U. S. Health Service,
Baltimore, Md.
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
We are herewith returning to you the three re-prints of the
papers on Impounded Waters which you so kindly sent us sometime ago.
We finally received from Washington other copies of these re-prints.
Thanking you very much for your courtesy in this matter, we are
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Wright & Wright BW,JR/B
(Enclosures)
